info.title: Have you or the person(s) living with you traveled in the last 2 weeks domestically or overseas, to an area with a high incidence of COVID-19 infection?
Within the past two weeks, have you or your family member (living together) been in close contact with a confirmed COVID-19 positive individual?

Within the past two weeks, have you or your family member (living together) been in close contact with anyone who had fever or respiratory symptoms and visited a domestic or overseas region with a high incidence of COVID-19, but have not yet been confirmed as COVID-19 positive?
Have you or or your family member been in close contact with anyone who developed unexplained fever and/or respiratory symptoms?
Are you taking any fever reducer (Tylenol, aspirin, Motrin, Advil or other NSAIDs)?
Do you have a runny nose and nasal congestion?
Do you have a sore throat?
Do you have a persistent cough?
Do you feel weakness and fatigue?
Do you have chest pain when you cough or breath deeply?
Are you short of breath or do you have difficulty breathing when you walk a short distance?
Are you short of breath or do you have difficulty breathing when you are at rest (sitting in a chair, lying in a bed)?
